pages.text: Being a measure of your physical ability, $(thing)Dexterity$() is trained in fairly obvious way: Moving!$(br)Being active and running around and jumping will gradually increase the skill, meaning you don't have to pay too much attention to training it.$(br)Utilising critical hits in combat also gives some $(thing)Dexterity$() xp.
pages.title: Training Methods

pages.text: You may also get some additional xp from utilising the various abilities $(thing)Dexterity$() gives you, so continue to be active and moving!
